summary.span: 包含可用于代码字符串以有助于防止应用程序遭到站点式脚本 (XSS） 的攻击和 LDAP 注入式攻击的方法。

span.span: Contains methods that you can use to encode strings in order help you protect your application against cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and LDAP injection attacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码的算法会分析规定的一组字符均视为安全并对所有其他字符进行编码的。The encoding algorithms look for a prescribed set of characters that are considered safe and encode all other characters. （这有时称为"安全列表"或"列入白名单。"）(This is sometimes referred to as "safe-listing" or "whitelisting.")
